I apologize but as an AI language model, I do not have access to Supermarine's specific post-purchase customer support strategies. However, here are some general tips that Supermarine or any company can implement to enhance their post-purchase customer support strategies:

1. Provide a detailed product manual with every purchase to help customers make the most of their investment. 
2. Create a dedicated support team to promptly respond to customer inquiries and concerns about the product or service. 
3. Offer multiple channels of support - email, phone, live chat or social media to give customers the option to choose the mode they prefer. 
4. Use customer feedback to improve products or services based on their feedback. Show that the company values the customer's opinion and is willing to listen to their feedback to improve their experience. 
5. Provide regular product updates and rollouts. Keep customers informed about upcoming product releases, security patches or bug fixes. 
6. Provide training or tutorial sessions that help customers use the product or service more effectively.
7. Offer a loyalty program or special discounts on future purchases to incentivize repeat business.
8. Ensure reliability in customer support by having a reliable system to track and address customer concerns.
 
These are some of the ways companies like Supermarine can enhance their post-purchase customer support strategies to increase customer loyalty.
